an3.76:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.76:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhavo hoti”ti?
an3.76:2.1: “Kamadhatuvepakkanca, ananda, kammam nabhavissa, api nu kho kamabhavo pannayetha”ti?
an3.76:2.3: “Iti kho, ananda, kammam khettam, vinnanam bijam, tanha sneho.
an3.76:2.4: Avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam hinaya dhatuya vinnanam patitthitam evam ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti. (…)
an3.76:3.1: Rupadhatuvepakkanca, ananda, kammam nabhavissa, api nu kho rupabhavo pannayetha”ti?
an3.76:3.3: “Iti kho, ananda, kammam khettam, vinnanam bijam, tanha sneho.
an3.76:3.4: Avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam majjhimaya dhatuya vinnanam patitthitam evam ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti. (…)
an3.76:4.1: Arupadhatuvepakkanca, ananda, kammam nabhavissa, api nu kho arupabhavo pannayetha”ti?
an3.76:4.3: “Iti kho, ananda, kammam khettam, vinnanam bijam, tanha sneho.
an3.76:4.4: Avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam panitaya dhatuya vinnanam patitthitam evam ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti.
